mapper.update:
UPDATE cb_process
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
client_id = #{clientId},
process_id = #{processId},
parent_process_id = #{parentProcessId},
name = #{name},
display_name = #{displayName},
type = #{type},
type_detail = #{typeDetail},
status = #{status},
version = #{version},
creator = #{creator},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE cb_process
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
client_id = #{clientId},
parent_process_id = #{parentProcessId},
name = #{name},
display_name = #{displayName},
type = #{type},
type_detail = #{typeDetail},
status = #{status},
version = #{version},
creator = #{creator},
WHERE process_id = #{processId}
